ExportDifferential.Statement:
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;
SELECT @@ EXPORT_FIELDS @@ FROM w2_ProductCategory WHERE w2_ProductCategory.date_changed >= @date_changed ORDER BY w2_ProductCategory.category_id ASC
